q8
AES(y1,x1) xor y1 = AES(y2,x2) xor y2
y2=AES(y1,x1) xor y1 xor AES(y2,x2)
y2=00000000000000000000000000000000 xor 00000000000000000000000000000000 xor 10000000000000000000000000000000

x1=140f0f1011b5223d79587717ffd9ec3a
y1=00000000000000000000000000000000
AES(y1,x1)=00000000000000000000000000000000

x2=136a477fe46907dea163597cd3dbc834
y2=10000000000000000000000000000000
AES(y2,x2)=10000000000000000000000000000000

q9
aes(x1,x1) xor y1 = aes(x2,x2) xor y2

aes(x1,x1) xor y1 xor aes(x2,x2) = y2
x1=00000000000000000000000000000000
y1=00000000000000000000000000000000
aes(x1,x1)=66e94bd4ef8a2c3b884cfa59ca342b2e
x2=00000000000000000000000000000001
y2=C797D4BD0B7876B00E6C4EF6B2DAD641
aes(x2,x2)=a17e9f69e4f25a8b8620b4af78eefd6f

y2=66e94bd4ef8a2c3b884cfa59ca342b2e xor 00000000000000000000000000000000 xor a17e9f69e4f25a8b8620b4af78eefd6f
66e94bd4 ef8a2c3b 884cfa59 ca342b2e
a17e9f69 e4f25a8b 8620b4af 78eefd6f
00000000 00000000 00000000 00000000
-----------------------------------
C797D4BD 0B7876B0 0E6C4EF6 B2DAD641

C797D4BD0B7876B00E6C4EF6B2DAD641

q3
not (r xor t, m) - says m not right half
not (m xor t, r) - says r not right half
must be:
The tag (r⊕m, t) is a valid tag for the 1-block message 0n.
The tag (r⊕1n, t) is a valid tag for the 1-block message m⊕1n.
